The scheduling delay,      cancellation, overwrite-protection, and event emission are all handled      by the OZ TimelockController \u2014 no hand-rolled state needed. STORAGE SAFETY:   Uses ERC-7201 namespaced storage to prevent slot collisions when   inherited by UUPS-upgradeable contracts alongside OZ upgradeable parents.   keccak256(abi.encode(uint256(keccak256(\"minted.storage.TimelockGoverned\")) - 1)) & ~bytes32(uint256(0xff)) INTEGRATION PATTERN:   1. Inherit TimelockGoverned   2. Call `_setTimelock(addr)` in the constructor   3. Mark admin setters with `onlyTimelock`   4. Operations are scheduled on the MintedTimelockController,      which calls the setter after the delay expires.","kind":"dev","methods":{"setTimelock(address)":{"details":"Must be called *through* the current timelock (i.e. scheduled +      executed as a normal timelocked operation)."}},"title":"TimelockGoverned","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"setTimelock(address)":{"notice":"Migrate to a new timelock controller."},"timelock()":{"notice":"Address of the MintedTimelockController that gates admin ops"}},"notice":"Base contract for all protocol contracts that delegate admin         operations to a MintedTimelockController.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/TimelockGoverned.sol":"TimelockGoverned"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":eth-gas-reporter/=node_modules/eth-gas-reporter/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/"]},"sources":{"contracts/TimelockGoverned.sol":{"keccak256":"0x96c4f926c827b6b4a75b967199c24c095b841ae81627e6d85508c9fb1a3eefcd","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://308afd0a4633248ebb93930eea731b53785d348e59fc78ef1c134fe1f9f03dd8","dweb:/ipfs/QmSuQgno2fDiwBPv6ti51TNbjoQAebfALBz5tWjSav69RE"]}},"version":1}
